import { Delete, Edit, FavoriteBorder, Forum } from '@material-ui/icons' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import "./post.css" const Post = ({post}) => { const params = useParams(); const postClass = ["post"]; if(params.id) { postClass.push("profile_post"); } return (
{post.userName}
{post.caption}
{/*
*/} 1 likes {/*
*/}
{post.posts}
) } export default Post
